description: Enables a trust anchor. When enabled, certificates in the trust anchor chain are authorized for trust validation. Required permissions: rolesanywhere:EnableTrustAnchor.

parameters.name: trustAnchorId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the trust anchor.

nested_items.name: trustAnchor
nested_items.description: The state of the trust anchor after a read or write operation.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The ISO-8601 timestamp when the trust anchor was created.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the trust anchor is enabled.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the trust anchor.

nested_items.name: notificationSettings
nested_items.description: A list of notification settings to be associated to the trust anchor.

nested_items.name: channel
nested_items.description: The specified channel of notification. IAM Roles Anywhere uses CloudWatch metrics, EventBridge, and Health Dashboard to notify for an event.

nested_items.name: configuredBy
nested_items.description: The principal that configured the notification setting. For default settings configured by IAM Roles Anywhere, the value is rolesanywhere.amazonaws.com, and for customized notifications settings, it is the respective account ID.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the notification setting is enabled.

nested_items.name: event
nested_items.description: The event to which this notification setting is applied.

nested_items.name: threshold
nested_items.description: The number of days before a notification event.

nested_items.name: sourceData
nested_items.description: The data field of the trust anchor depending on its type.

nested_items.name: acmPcaArn
nested_items.description: The root certificate of the Private Certificate Authority specified by this ARN is used in trust validation for temporary credential requests. Included for trust anchors of type AWS_ACM_PCA.

nested_items.name: x509CertificateData
nested_items.description: The PEM-encoded data for the certificate anchor. Included for trust anchors of type CERTIFICATE_BUNDLE.

nested_items.name: sourceType
nested_items.description: The type of the trust anchor.

nested_items.name: trustAnchorArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the trust anchor.

nested_items.name: trustAnchorId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the trust anchor.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The ISO-8601 timestamp when the trust anchor was last updated.
